jlmsplugin.name: JComments integration
jlmsplugin.author: JoomlaLMS Team
jlmsplugin.description: This plugin integrates jComments commenting system into JoomlaLMS and allows comment on courses and course topics.
jlmsplugin.short_description: Integrates jComments commenting system into JoomlaLMS

param.name: cc_view_type
param.label: Comments position
param.description: Select the way where comments listing will be shown on the course page

param.name: search_course_comments
param.label: Show 'search' box?
param.description: Enable or disable box to search through course comments

param.name: search_course_through
param.label: Search through
param.description: Choose how search box will work
param.option: All the comments related to the course

param.name: search_topic_comments
param.label: Show 'search' box?
param.description: Enable or disable box to search through specific topic comments
